accountId.description: The id of the account that the sales order line is related to.

amountExcludingTax.description: The line amount excluding the tax. Read-Only.

anyOf.description: The total amount for the line including tax. Read-Only.

description.description: Specifies the description of the sales order line.

discountAmount.description: The sales order line discount amount.

discountAppliedBeforeTax.description: Specifies whether the discount is applied before tax.

documentId.description: The ID of the parent sales order line.

id.description: The unique ID of the sales order line. Non-editable.

invoiceDiscountAllocation.description: The sales order line discount allocation is the sales order line discount distributed on the total amount. Read-Only.

invoiceQuantity.description: The quantity of items from the sales order line to be invoiced. Read-Only.

invoicedQuantity.description: The quantity of items from the sales order line that was invoiced.

itemId.description: The ID of the item in the sales order line.

lineType.description: The type of the sales order line. It can be 'Comment', 'Account', 'Item', 'Resource' Value', 'Fixed Asset' or 'Charge'.

netAmount.description: The net amount is the amount including all discounts (taken from the sales order line). Read-Only.

anyOf.description: The net amount including tax is the total net amount including tax. Read-Only.
The net tax amount is the tax amount calculated from net amount. Read-Only.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item in the sales order line.

shipQuantity.description: The quantity of items from the order to be shipped.

shipmentDate.description: The date the item in the line is expected to ship.

shippedQuantity.description: The quantity of items from the order already shipped. Read-Only.

taxCode.description: The tax code for the line.

taxPercent.description: The tax percent for the line. Read-Only.

anyOf.description: The total tax amount for the sales order line. Read-Only.

unitOfMeasureId.description: The ID of unit of measure for the sales order line.

unitPrice.description: Specifies the price for one unit of the item in the specified sales order line.
